mapper.select: select id, categ_id, apply_order_no, app_id, app_name, platform, platform_order_no, platform_app_id, platform_app_name, applicant, tenant_name, tenant_id, deleted from app_apply where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into app_apply(categ_id, apply_order_no, app_id, app_name, platform, platform_order_no, platform_app_id, platform_app_name, applicant, tenant_name, tenant_id, deleted) values (#{categId}, #{applyOrderNo}, #{appId}, #{appName}, #{platform}, #{platformOrderNo}, #{platformAppId}, #{platformAppName}, #{applicant}, #{tenantName}, #{tenantId}, #{deleted})

insert into app_apply(categ_id, apply_order_no, app_id, app_name, platform, platform_order_no, platform_app_id, platform_app_name, applicant, tenant_name, tenant_id, deleted) values
(#{entity.categId}, #{entity.applyOrderNo}, #{entity.appId}, #{entity.appName}, #{entity.platform}, #{entity.platformOrderNo}, #{entity.platformAppId}, #{entity.platformAppName}, #{entity.applicant}, #{entity.tenantName}, #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.deleted})

insert into app_apply(categ_id, apply_order_no, app_id, app_name, platform, platform_order_no, platform_app_id, platform_app_name, applicant, tenant_name, tenant_id, deleted) values
(#{entity.categId}, #{entity.applyOrderNo}, #{entity.appId}, #{entity.appName}, #{entity.platform}, #{entity.platformOrderNo}, #{entity.platformAppId}, #{entity.platformAppName}, #{entity.applicant}, #{entity.tenantName}, #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.deleted})
on duplicate key update categ_id = values(categ_id), apply_order_no = values(apply_order_no), app_id = values(app_id), app_name = values(app_name), platform = values(platform), platform_order_no = values(platform_order_no), platform_app_id = values(platform_app_id), platform_app_name = values(platform_app_name), applicant = values(applicant), tenant_name = values(tenant_name), tenant_id = values(tenant_id), deleted = values(deleted)
mapper.update:
update app_apply
categ_id = #{categId},
apply_order_no = #{applyOrderNo},
app_id = #{appId},
app_name = #{appName},
platform = #{platform},
platform_order_no = #{platformOrderNo},
platform_app_id = #{platformAppId},
platform_app_name = #{platformAppName},
applicant = #{applicant},
tenant_name = #{tenantName},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
deleted = #{deleted},
where id = #{id}
